author: ate
msg: context path and docbase in tomcat context file now are filtered when installed

author: ate
msg: portal tables are now always dropped before a new schema is created
using one central drop.sql script with setting "continue" on execute errors.
Note: for database without generated "drop table if exists" logic (Oracle, PostgreSQL)
the drop statements will be removed automatically now after generation.
The drop drops goals will not be needed anymore this way.

author: ate
msg: Generated scripts will be put under a folder schema.
Thereafter the static (hardcoded) scripts will be copied over.
The override folder name therefor now must be schema.
